content.text: I'll help search for Evolve Med Spa's headquarters location using the search_web function.

content.content:
{
  "content": [
    {
      "type": "text",
      "text": "Evolve Med Spa’s corporate headquarters is listed at 706 Grand St, Hoboken, New Jersey 07030, United States.[1]

- ZoomInfo’s company profile for Evolve Med Spa identifies the “corporate office” at 706 Grand St, Hoboken, NJ 07030.[1]
- Note: Evolve also operates clinics at other addresses (e.g., a Hoboken clinic page lists 1025 Maxwell Lane), but those are service locations, not the corporate HQ.[5]

Regarding Revelstoke Capital: Evolve Med Spa is described by media and industry sources as a Revelstoke Capital Partners portfolio company, but Revelstoke’s public portfolio page does not list every investment; their site focuses on selected featured investments and does not explicitly list Evolve Med Spa on the page reviewed.[4] If you need formal confirmation of portfolio status, I can check press releases or transaction announcements.

content.text: I'll help verify if Evolve Med Spa is an active portfolio company of Revelstoke Capital using Perplexity search. Let me search for recent information about this relationship.

input.query: Evolve Med Spa Revelstoke Capital Partners portfolio company current status

content.content:
{
  "content": [
    {
      "type": "text",
      "text": "Evolve Med Spa was acquired by a private equity buyer in April 2024, but neither the press release nor follow-on deal notes identify the buyer by name, and there is no public evidence that it is a Revelstoke Capital Partners portfolio company as of now.[1][3] 

Key points:
- Viper Partners announced it served as exclusive sell-side advisor on the “acquisition of Evolve Med Spa by a private equity group” on April 5, 2024; the acquirer was not disclosed.[1] Healthcare Dealflow’s item on the transaction also cites the same announcement without naming the buyer.[3]
- Revelstoke Capital Partners’ published investment portfolio does not list Evolve Med Spa, and their site/news items do not mention an Evolve investment as of the latest updates available.[5][2]

Implication:
- Based on publicly available information, Evolve Med Spa’s current ownership includes an undisclosed private equity sponsor, but there is no confirmation that Revelstoke Capital Partners is the owner or that Evolve is a Revelstoke portfolio company.[1][3][5]

Sources:
1. https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/emerging-trends-in-the-med-spa-industry-viper-partners-insightful-advisory-on-evolve-med-spa-transition-302108307.html
2. https://www.revelstokecapital.com/news/revelstoke-capital-partners-recognized-on-inc-s-2024-list-of-founder-friendly-investors/
3. https://healthcaredealflow.com/evolve-med-spa-acquired-by-pe-firm/
4. https://www.stout.com/en/news/stout-advises-nakedmd-growth-investment-revelstoke-capital-partner
5. https://www.revelstokecapital.com/investments/


(Results from Perplexity sonar-pro)"
    }
  ],
  "isError": false
}

content.text: Let me do one more search to ensure we have the most comprehensive information:

input.query: Evolve Med Spa ownership current 2024 private equity acquisition details

content.content:
{
  "content": [
    {
      "type": "text",
      "text": "Evolve Med Spa was acquired by a **private equity group** in 2024; Viper Partners acted as the exclusive sell-side advisor to Evolve’s owners in the transaction.[1][3]

Key details:
- The acquisition was publicly disclosed on April 5, 2024, via PR Newswire, describing a private equity purchase of Evolve Med Spa; the buyer was not named in the announcement.[1] Healthcare Dealflow corroborated the transaction and sourcing to the PR Newswire release.[3]
- Evolve Med Spa is led by CEO/founder **Jeffery Mandler** and has grown into one of the largest branded med spa platforms in the U.S., with a strong Northeast footprint; this leadership and scale context was highlighted alongside the acquisition news.[1][3]
- Around the time of the acquisition, Evolve continued expansion, including a February 7, 2024 grand opening in Pikesville, Maryland, indicating ongoing growth under its brand platform.[5]

What’s not disclosed:
- The announcement and secondary coverage do not identify the specific private equity firm, transaction size, or deal structure.[1][3] Broader industry reporting confirms increasing PE activity and competitive valuations in med spa platforms, but does not add buyer identity for this deal.[2]

If you want, I can keep monitoring for filings, portfolio updates, or trade coverage that reveal the PE sponsor’s name and terms.

Sources:
1. https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/emerging-trends-in-the-med-spa-industry-viper-partners-insightful-advisory-on-evolve-med-spa-transition-302108307.html
2. https://beautymatter.com/articles/medical-spa-service-industry-scrubs-up-well-for-investors
3. https://healthcaredealflow.com/evolve-med-spa-acquired-by-pe-firm/
4. https://pestakeholder.org/news/private-equity-health-care-acquisitions-june-2024/
5. https://www.accessnewswire.com/newsroom/en/healthcare-and-pharmaceutical/evolve-med-spa-celebrates-grand-opening-of-newest-location-in-pikesvil-831981


(Results from Perplexity sonar-pro)"
    }
  ],
  "isError": false
}
